Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 41st overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/7/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2015, winning 2 games with a 3.07 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2015, going 4-1, 2.13...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/6/2016 to a 1-year deal worth $20,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/4/2017 to a 5-year deal worth $7,000,501 per year...
Had first career hit on 5/9/2017, off Clarence Palmer (SEA)...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
